data.title: Two Great Ladies With Lots Of Great Cupcakes
data.text:
My wife and I happened by chance upon this small bakery in downtown Rogers. We were walking down the street on the way to the Rogers Historical Museum, and suddenly spotted the bakery and just had to go inside.

There we found two great ladies with wonderful personalities and winning smiles.

We ordered a pumpkin cupcake and also a vanilla cupcake with turquoise icing. Both were delicious and obviously took a while to design and make.

This is a delightful place to pause, relax and enjoy some great cupcakes. And tell those two great ladies/owners behind the counter hello.

J. Randolph Smith
Monroe, LA

data.title: Good Cupcakes
data.text: I stopped by and thought I would try their cupcakes for the first time.  It was mid afternoon and apparently they had experienced a run on their treats earlier in the day.  The selection at this time of afternoon were rather limited.  However, what I did try and good and moist.  This was much better than the dried up things you see in the grocery store bakeries.

data.title: Nice People Nice Cupcakes
data.text: You couldn't ask for nicer people or wait staff. The cupcakes, while good, aren't spectacular like those we enjoy at Cupcakes on Kavanaugh in Little Rock.

data.title: I'll start dinner with a Kirby Kupcake!!
data.text: This place has THE BEST KUPCAKES EVER!!!  I have eaten so many over the years that I should be embarrassed but I'm not!!  Ms. Lisa & Ms. Kirby are so sweet & a true jewel to the Rogers area!  YOU HAVE TO TRY A CUPCAKE!!

data.title: Oh So Good!!!
data.text:
These are the absolute Best Cupcakes I've had in NWA... They are sweet, moist, and just plain Delicious!  Kirby's cupcakes now have my vote and my cupcake business as long as I'm in the NWA area. 

You must Try Them!!!!

data.title: Frequent visitor, best cupcakes around!
data.text: You can't get better cupcakes than Kirby's! Been going for years! The Chazberry is hands down the best cupcake in the world! All their options have yummy icing & are consistently moist! Kirby & Lisa are also very sweet & will accommodate your any need!

data.title: Moist cupcakes.
data.text: We dropped in to pick out some Valentine treats.  I'm so glad we did!  The cupcakes are delicious and very moist, which is not always the case with cupcakes.  We will be back for sure!  Fun stop if you're in downtown Rogers.

data.title: Delicious  cakes and very friendly and professional
data.text:
Love this place.  I ordered very cute cupcakes for my daughter's baby shower.   Many many different flavors to choose from. 
This shop is in Historic Downtown Rogers and is certainly an  asset.  P.s.  You can also just walk in and sample their cupcakes or buy just one to spoil yourself 🍥🍥

data.title: Decent cupcakes, bad icing.
data.text: I thought that since this was a bakery specializing in cupcakes that the frosting and cupcakes would be worth the price.  The cake was decent but nothing special.  The icing tasted like sugar and shortening.  We ordered a dozen mini cakes so we could try different flavors.  There are 5 people in my family and we didn't even finish them.  My 3 year old only ate half of a mini and my teens said they tasted funny.  I realize I'm in the minority but I don't understand the attraction.  I like quality ingredients like real vanilla and cocoa.  These tasted cheap and unimaginative.

data.title: Delicious!
data.text: You cannot go wrong stopping in to Kirby's.  Best cupcakes in town.  My favorite is the raspberry chocolate but I'd be surprised if any of them were not perfectly delicious.  Worth the trip to downtown Rogers.

data.title: Greatest Cupcakes Ever!!!!
data.text: Best handmade cupcakes I have ever had. I would drive long distances just to come back. I suggest everyone need to stop in and try them

data.title: Delicious traditional cupcakes
data.text: Kirby's Kupcakes are delicious!  What I most appreciate about these cupcakes is that they're not going for some wacky type of differentiation - they are solidly traditional cupcakes.  Perfectly moist cake, sweet buttery frosting and just a touch of decoration on top. Absolutely scrumptious!!!

data.title: SO much better than Bliss!
data.text: I'm a huge fan on Kirby's cupcakes. They're moist. Made fresh daily. The icing is amazing. The chazberry is my favorite, but I've never had one I didn't like. If you haven't tried one yet, you're missing out. :)

data.title: The best cupcakes in America!!
data.text: I have eaten these cupcakes many times and am always extremely pleased. These are the best cupcakes I have ever tasted. Moist, sweet, and the frosting is a special recipe that somehow has the perfect texture every time I eat it. I will drive from Texas to get these cupcakes!!

data.title: Best Cupcakes I've Ever Had!
data.text: Cupcakes are incredibly moist and the frostings and fillings are really good. I wish they would not have closed their store on the Bentonville Square.

data.title: Good cupcakes
data.text: Ordered my child's cupcakes 2 weeks in advanced. The day I was to pick them up I arrived a hour early. The lady in charge told me they were not ready come back in an hour. Couldn't believe they were done at the last minute. They looked like they were done in a hurry. That did not feel good as a paying customer. But, the strawberry is very good. So I'll end it on a nice note.
